Package controller

Class AppointmentAddView

java.lang.Object
controller.AppointmentAddView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentAddView extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This method controller is used to add appointments that are inputted by the user in the FXML scene.

    • saveAppointment

      public void saveAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method will save an appointment using user input from text-fields, combo boxes, and date-picker. There is also logic validation for null inputs, as well as, time/date validation. When all conditions are met, the data will be inserted into the mySQL database using JDBCAppointments.insert() method.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The Lambda expression here is used to create alerts.

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method will cancel adding the appointment and return to the Appointment View
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
      IOException
